tasks.task: MAINTASK: Convert organic living soil to no-till method
subtasks: Combine Fox Farm Ocean Forest and Happy Frog in a 1:1 ratio and add down-to-earth dry amendments.
Introduce existing compost to provide microbial life and combine with top dressing ingredients.
Apply top dressing mixture of compost, down-to-earth, crab meal, and langbanite after harvesting.
Set up proper airflow using fans (floor on low, intake on half speed, outtake on constant).
Allow adequate time for decomposition and microbial activity before replanting.
Test soil periodically for specific nutrient needs and adjust amendments accordingly.
Consider using cover crops or adding night crawlers for long-term soil health.

tasks.task: The transcript focuses on converting organic living soil to a no-till method. The MAINTASK is "Convert organic living soil to no-till method," with several subtasks outlined for the physical actions involved. These include:
MAINTASK: Convert organic living soil to no-till method
subtasks: Combine Fox Farm Ocean Forest and Happy Frog in a 1:1 ratio and add down-to-earth dry amendments.
Introduce existing compost to provide microbial life and combine with top dressing ingredients.
Apply top dressing mixture of compost, down-to-earth, crab meal, and langbanite after harvesting.
Set up proper airflow using fans (floor on low, intake on half speed, outtake on constant).
Allow adequate time for decomposition and microbial activity before replanting.
Test soil periodically and adjust amendments based on results.
Consider cover cropping and adding night crawlers for ongoing soil health.
